thread.title: Guns n Roses tribute to rock Southampton
thread.title_full: Guns n Roses tribute to rock Southampton

title: Guns n Roses tribute to rock Southampton
text:
'NOBODY does it better!' ...that is the consensus of opinion on rock tribute band The Guns N Roses Experience. 
The must-see band play Southampton 's Talking Heads on Friday October 30. 
'Gn’Re' are said to have the only singer able to deliver the exact same unique vocal style and stage show synonymous with Classic Axl Rose. And they have the only tribute band guitarist officially supported by Marshall Amps, just like the legend Slash himself. Together with four other Gn’R clones, these guys deliver a sound and look that is unequalled by any other band. Share article 
Since their very first gig the Guns N' Roses Experience train has been rolling at a pace, visiting various Middle Eastern countries, mainland Europe, Cyprus, Ireland and all of the major venues in the UK.With a true GN’R sound and stage show, The Guns N' Roses Experience meticulously recreates every visual detail and every musical note to capture that reckless spirit of the original Guns ‘N Roses legendary live performances. In a bone crushing two hour set all the essentials are covered with breathtaking accuracy including Welcome To The Jungle, November Rain, Sweet Child O' Mine, Paradise City, Mr. Brownstone, You Could Be Mine, Nightrain, Rocket Queen, Knocking on Heaven’s Door and so much more... 
Tickets £10 advance from the venue or website www.thetalkingheads.co.uk Promoted Stories Guns n Roses tribute to rock Southampton Sorry, an error occurred.
